mapper.sql: id, stid, objective, rebate, credit, description, status
mapper.select: select t.*, st.id as stid,st.name as stname from dealer_credit_dic t left outer join shoptype_dic st on t.stid = st.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0

select t.*, st.id as stid,st.name as stname from dealer_credit_dic t left outer join shoptype_dic st on t.stid = st.id where t.status=0 and st.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" order by t.id asc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}

select t.*, st.id as stid,st.name as stname from dealer_credit_dic t left outer join shoptype_dic st on t.stid = st.id where t.status=0 order by t.id asc
limit ${offset}, ${pageSize}
select count(*) from dealer_credit_dic t left outer join shoptype_dic st on t.stid = st.id where st.name like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0
select count(*) from dealer_credit_dic where status=0
select t.*, st.id as stid,st.name as stname from dealer_credit_dic t left outer join shoptype_dic st on t.stid = st.id where t.stid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0
mapper.insert: insert into dealer_credit_dic (id, stid, objective, rebate, credit, description, status,date) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{objective,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rebate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{credit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into dealer_credit_dic
id,
stid,
objective,
rebate,
credit,
description,
status,
date,

mapper.update:
update dealer_credit_dic
stid = #{type.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
objective = #{objective,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rebate = #{rebate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
credit = #{credit,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dealer_credit_dic set stid = #{type.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, objective = #{objective,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rebate = #{rebate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, credit = #{credit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
